headline: Radical Leftists Attack And Harass Congressman Paul Gosar’s Intern Faith Graham On Campus At American University — Car Vandalized MULTIPLE TIMES
author: Jordan Conradson
sentences:
Graham says she has, “never seen or spoken to any of the individuals that targeted me.”
Graham wants her university to know “that the culture at AU is toxic.”
The radical leftist students vandalized faith’s car multiple times, leaving nasty bumper stickers in retaliation for her Trump sticker.

TRENDING: Newsmax Host Greg Kelly: "Kevin McCarthy Is a Swamp Snake and We Don't Like Him - In a Moment of Crisis He Wet His Pants" (VIDEO)
Recently, Graham says she was greeted by an angry “mob” of students outside her dorm room.
Faith Graham, the daughter of former AZGOP Chairman Robert Graham, was recently attacked on campus resulting in vandalism of her property at D.C.’s American Unversity for her conservative beliefs.
The leftist mob in Washington, D.C. targeted Faith for her position with the Congressman and her affiliations with President Trump and the Republican Party.
“A mob showed up to my dorm room pounding on my door, yelling profanity, telling me I should not be there, and that I am not welcome,” Graham revealed.

“A second, even larger group showed up and continued the foul and offensive behavior.”
“The students visited my dorm because I’m simply a conservative.

“It’s kind of funny.”
“after the mob had been told to leave, they came back with a larger group to bother her and ruin her night,” said Graham
WATCH:
Further, students drew on and scratched Faith’s car with keys, spit gum, and left food on her vehicle, attempting to silence her.
She also currently works for Republican Congressman Paul Gosar of Arizona, helping to produce his ‘Gosar Minute’ segments.
The video below shows radical leftist students leaving the dormitory after others came to Graham’s defense.

Campus Reform reported,
In the past, Graham has spoken at rallies in support of President Donald J. Trump.
I have pictures on my Instagram with President Trump, and have spoken at his rallies in the 2016 campaign.
Faith is also an intern for Congressman Paul Gosar’s office.
Students are heard saying, “This is where we live.
People find that out and target me,” she added.
Get out.” The leftist mob responded.
